mapper.insert: INSERT INTO genre (genreno, genre, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate, name) VALUES (genre_seq.NEXTVAL, #{genre}, 1, #{seqno}, #{visible}, SYSDATE, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM genre ORDER BY seqno ASC, genreno asc
SELECT genre FROM genre WHERE name='--' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT * FROM genre WHERE name='--' AND visible = 'Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT * FROM genre WHERE name!='--' AND visible='Y' AND genre=#{genre} ORDER BY seqno ASC
